data.text: @Ashwin021 Hi Ashwin, if we may share, when you purchase a combination of fare types, the most restrictive conditions apply to cancellation fees. You may refer to https://t.co/fGuuS10TVj for more information about fare types. Kindly note that rebooking and re-routing changes (1/2)

data.text: @bobanrocky Hi there, we are sorry to hear of this. If we may share, if you wish to upgrade your booking to a higher cabin class, you can redeem your KrisFlyer miles, purchase mySQupgrade, or pay the fare difference(https://t.co/84UfeyEjrr). (1/2)

data.text: @arronluckydog Hi there, if we may share, you should be able to make the connection if you are able to book the flight itinerary on our website. However, if you are concerned about the short connection time, you may wish to consider other flight options. (1/2)

data.text: @toots_le_chien Hi Timothy, may we know which SIA email address you're in contact with regarding your baggage, and what was last advised by our colleagues?

urls.title: Advance Seat Selection | Singapore Airlines
urls.description: Enjoy complimentary advance seat selection when flying with Singapore Airlines in any of our Suites, First Class, Business Class,Premium Economy Class, or Economy Class cabins.
Singapore Airlines - Baggage Services

data.text: @iamkirstenme You may wish to refer to https://t.co/rhR52nHm5S for more details on advance seat selection. Additionally, we note that your baggage was delayed. May we know if you have already filed a delayed baggage report online (https://t.co/P0BuMcZem7) or at the arrival airport? (2/2)

data.text: @iamkirstenme Hi Kirsten, if we may share, if no seats are selected before flight departure, passengers will be assigned a seat but without any guarantee of the resulting seat type or if they will be seated together with the other passengers in their booking. (1/2)
